skills.name: Fluxclaw
skills.description: Invokes a short ranged arcane claw that slashes targets twice, dealing $DMG damage each slash.

ranks.description: Invokes a short ranged arcane claw that slashes targets twice, dealing $DMG damage each slash.

skills.name: Fluxbolt
skills.description: Casts a magic projectile that explodes on impact, dealing $DMG damage. Multi hits up to four times.

ranks.description: Casts a magic projectile that explodes on impact, dealing $DMG damage. Multi hits up to four times.

skills.name: Nova
skills.description: Emits a ring of magic energy around the caster, dealing $DMG damage. Provides knockback to hit targets. Can potentially apply a snare condition.

ranks.description: Emits a ring of magic energy around the caster, dealing $DMG damage. Provides knockback to hit targets. Can potentially apply a snare condition.

skills.name: Cross
skills.description: Manifests a source of explosive arcane magic, dealing $DMG damage to afflicted targets. Applies an elemental condition.

ranks.description: Manifests a source of explosive arcane magic, dealing $DMG damage to afflicted targets. Applies an elemental condition.

skills.name: Fluxspear
skills.description: Casts a short piercing arcane spear, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a snare condition to adjacent targets.

ranks.description: Casts a short piercing arcane spear, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a snare condition to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Restora
skills.description: Restores nearby friendly targets and the caster's health by $DMG.

ranks.description: Restores nearby friendly targets and the caster's health by $DMG.

skills.name: Prism
skills.description: Forms a shield around the caster, absorbing damage.

ranks.description: Forms a shield around the caster, absorbing damage.

skills.name: Imbue
skills.description: Imbues a mystical boon to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Imbues a mystical boon to the caster and nearby allies.

skills.name: Blink
skills.description: Unlocks the ability to quickly teleport from one point to another. Double tap $DASHINPUT to blink.

ranks.description: Unlocks the ability to quickly teleport from one point to another. Double tap $DASHINPUT to blink.

skills.name: Manaflow
skills.description: Increases mana regeneration speed by 36%.

ranks.description: Increases mana regeneration speed by 36%.

skills.name: Ruin
skills.description: Invokes a glyph that spawns a swirl of shadow magic, dealing $DMG shadow damage up to three hits to targets within the radius.

ranks.description: Invokes a glyph that spawns a swirl of shadow magic, dealing $DMG shadow damage up to three hits to targets within the radius.

skills.name: Haste
skills.description: Grants a buff increasing skill casting speed and skill cooldown speed to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Grants a buff increasing skill casting speed and skill cooldown speed to the caster and nearby allies.

skills.name: Chroma Ray
skills.description: Casts a holy ray, healing allies it passes by and damaging targets continuously for $DMG holy damage on hit.

ranks.description: Casts a holy ray, healing allies it passes by and damaging targets continuously for $DMG holy damage on hit.

skills.name: Genesis
skills.description: Applies a timed holy bomb to surrounding targets, dealing $DMG holy damage and decreasing their holy resistance.

ranks.description: Applies a timed holy bomb to surrounding targets, dealing $DMG holy damage and decreasing their holy resistance.

skills.name: Healos
skills.description: Casts a holy glyph, healing the caster and surrounding allies by $DMG and providing a heal over time condition to them.

ranks.description: Casts a holy glyph, healing the caster and surrounding allies by $DMG and providing a heal over time condition to them.

skills.name: Shadow Ward
skills.description: Applies a ward to the caster and nearby allies, increasing their shadow resistance and magic defense.

ranks.description: Applies a ward to the caster and nearby allies, increasing their shadow resistance and magic defense.
